title: The Goldman Lawyer With an Epstein Problem
description: Goldman Sachs' top lawyer, Kathryn Ruemmler, resigned after the latest Epstein files release. Bloomberg Opinion columnist Beth Kowitt is surprised her departure took this long. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Goldman Sachs' top lawyer, Kathryn Ruemmler, resigned after the latest Epstein files release. Bloomberg Opinion columnist Beth Kowitt is surprised her departure took this long. (Source: Bloomberg)
